ygData.subject: Re: Something new???
ygData.msgSnippet: I picked up on of these , it looks like a banded bracer , +10 sv poison , All/All , but cannot be equipped at all , it s a no drop lore item , definitely not
ygData.messageBody:
I picked up on of these , it looks like a banded bracer , +10 sv poison ,
All/All , but cannot be equipped at all ,
it's a no drop lore item , definitely not an instrument , gotta be a quest
component ,

it's tucked away in the bank now for a rainy day , along with various
lambent components

hope this is for a good quest , just gonna wait it out and see , I'm
checking the quest sites daily for info ,

Nokker StormSurge
29 Half Elf Bard
Rallos Zek - Mystic Decree

----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 11:20 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Something new???


> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> [clipped off a post on eq-vault innoruuk msg board]
>
> In steamfont a new mino a Minotaur Lord spawns..like every 4 mins..pretty
> easy about 30..i get exp off him still too..but he is
green..wierd..anyways
> he drops a BROKEN MINOTAUR LORDS HORN...any idea people? no drop lore...
>
> [end clip]
>
> hmm, something finally happening with new bard instruments?
>
> Sylly
